name: Memorabilia
description:
MEMORABILIA is a mystery puzzle game featuring an atmospheric first-person experience in a mansion.

MEMORABILIA has a multiple ending storyline, making each important for the final outcome.

You come to your childhood mansion to discover what was left behind after your final family member passes away. What seems like a normal closure visit slowly becomes a journey to discover your real childhood story. You need to alter your memories to change the get across in your childhood mansion in order to solve your past. Find notes and diaries, explore your past, change your memories, and ultimately find out what really happened. But don't forget, going into the mansion means finding irreversible truths.
